TABLE.NAME: presentation
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the presentation activity module instances.

FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the course this activity is part of.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the activity module instance

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was added to the course.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was last modified.

FIELD.NAME: intro
FIELD.COMMENT: Activity description.

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The format of the intro field.

FIELD.NAME: grade
FIELD.COMMENT: The maximum grade for this activity.

FIELD.NAME: gradepass
FIELD.COMMENT: The grade to pass this activity.

FIELD.NAME: blindmarking
FIELD.COMMENT: Enable blind marking.

FIELD.NAME: hidegrader
FIELD.COMMENT: Hide grader identity from students.

FIELD.NAME: markingworkflow
FIELD.COMMENT: Enable marking workflow.

FIELD.NAME: markingallocation
FIELD.COMMENT: Enable marking allocation.

FIELD.NAME: allowsubmissionsfromdate
FIELD.COMMENT: Date from which submissions are allowed.

FIELD.NAME: duedate
FIELD.COMMENT: he due date for submissions.

FIELD.NAME: cutoffdate
FIELD.COMMENT: The final cutoff date for submissions.

FIELD.NAME: maxfiles
FIELD.COMMENT: Maximum number of files that can be submitted.

FIELD.NAME: maxsize
FIELD.COMMENT: Maximum size of a single submission file.

TABLE.NAME: presentation_submissions
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the student submissions for the presentation activity.

FIELD.NAME: presentationid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the presentation instance.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the student who submitted.

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the submission was created.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the submission was last modified.

FIELD.NAME: grade
FIELD.COMMENT: The grade given by the teacher.

FIELD.NAME: teachercomment
FIELD.COMMENT: The feedback comment given by the teacher.

FIELD.NAME: teachercommentformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The format of the teacher's comment.
